title: Add new uploaded photo to Photos gallery (PMK TOWING SERVICE)

requirements.summary: Add Photo_1770974399544.png as a static upload asset and include it in the existing Photos gallery list with appropriate alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: The file Photo_1770974399544.png is available as a static asset under the existing uploads path and is reachable via a /assets/uploads/... URL like the other photos.
The Photos section (frontend/src/components/PhotosSection.tsx) includes a new entry for /assets/uploads/Photo_1770974399544.png in its photos list.
The new image renders correctly on the homepage in the Photos grid on both mobile (1 column) and desktop (2 columns), without breaking the layout.
The rendered for the new photo includes a clear, English alt text describing the image (towing logo/branding and contact number).

file_operations.description: Add the provided image file to the existing static uploads directory so it is served alongside the other gallery images and is reachable at /assets/uploads/Photo_1770974399544.png.

Append a new photo object to the existing `photos` array with `src` set to /assets/uploads/Photo_1770974399544.png and an English `alt` text describing the PMK Towing branding/logo and contact number; keep the existing responsive grid behavior unchanged.
